scenarios.title: ITC with Partial Delivery
scenarios.description: Complex scenario involving goods delivered in multiple lots
questions: I purchased raw materials for my factory and received the invoice on 25th August 2024. However, due to a logistics delay, the goods were delivered in three separate lots. The first lot arrived on 28th August, the second on 5th September, and the last lot on 15th September 2024. Can I claim the Input Tax Credit (ITC) for this invoice in my GSTR-3B return for August 2024?
What if the last lot arrives after the due date for filing the return?
Which specific rule covers the receipt of goods in multiple lots for ITC purposes?

scenarios.title: Blocked Credits - Employee Benefits
questions: Is GST credit allowed on employee food and beverage expenses?
What if the food is provided through a statutory canteen under the Factories Act?
Are there any exceptions if I supply the same food services to customers?

scenarios.title: ITC Reversal Requirements
scenarios.description: When and how to reverse wrongly claimed credit
questions: I claimed ITC on inputs that were later used for exempt supplies. When should I reverse this credit?
How do I calculate the reversal amount if goods are used partly for taxable and partly for exempt supplies?
In which return form should I report the ITC reversal?

scenarios.title: Late Filing Penalties
scenarios.description: Understanding late fees and interest calculation
questions: My GSTR-3B was filed 18 days late with NIL tax liability. What late fee do I need to pay?
Is the late fee different for Central GST and State GST?
Are there any waiver notifications that apply to my case?

scenarios.title: Amendment in Returns
questions: I made an error in my GSTR-1 for July 2024. Can I amend it in August's return?
What is the time limit for making amendments to invoices?
Do I need to file a separate amendment return or can it be done in the regular return?

scenarios.title: Professional Services RCM
scenarios.description: RCM on legal, CA, and other professional services
questions: Is legal consultancy from a partnership firm to a company covered under reverse charge?
Which notification or section specifically lists professional services under RCM?
How should I report this RCM transaction in my GSTR-3B?

scenarios.title: GTA Services
scenarios.description: Reverse charge on Goods Transport Agency services
questions: When is reverse charge applicable on GTA services?
Can I claim ITC on the GST paid under RCM for GTA services in the same return?
What documents do I need to maintain for RCM on transport services?

scenarios.title: LUT vs IGST for Exports
scenarios.description: Choosing between Letter of Undertaking and IGST payment
questions: Can I export services under LUT without paying IGST?
In what situations is claiming IGST refund faster than using LUT?
What are the eligibility conditions and documentation needed for LUT?

scenarios.title: Deemed Exports
questions: What qualifies as a deemed export under GST?
Can I claim refund on deemed exports if the buyer has an advance authorization?
Which form should I use to claim deemed export benefits?

scenarios.title: E-Invoicing Threshold
questions: My turnover was 8 crores in FY 2022-23 and 12 crores in FY 2023-24. Is e-invoicing mandatory for me now?
Does the threshold apply separately for B2B and B2C transactions?
What are the penalties for non-compliance with e-invoicing?

scenarios.title: E-Invoice Cancellation
questions: Within what time period can I cancel an e-invoice?
What happens if goods have already been dispatched when I cancel the e-invoice?
Do I need to generate a credit note after cancelling an e-invoice?

scenarios.title: Time of Supply - Services
scenarios.description: Determining when GST becomes payable on services
questions: I received an advance on 5th January, raised the invoice on 20th January, and completed the service on 25th January. When does GST become payable?
What happens if the invoice is issued after 30 days of service completion?
Are there any exceptions for continuous supply of services?

scenarios.title: Place of Supply - Interstate
questions: I provide IT services remotely to a client in Maharashtra while my business is in Karnataka. What is the place of supply?
What if the client is an SEZ unit - does that change the place of supply?
Does the billing address vs service delivery location matter?

scenarios.title: Software as a Service (SaaS)
scenarios.description: GST rate and classification for cloud services
questions: What is the GST rate for Software as a Service (SaaS)?

Are there any exemptions for educational or healthcare-related SaaS?

scenarios.title: Composite Supply
scenarios.description: Tax rate on bundled goods and services
questions: I sell a computer with installation and training services as a package. How do I determine the GST rate?
What is the difference between composite supply and mixed supply?
Which tax rate applies if multiple items in a bundle have different rates?

scenarios.title: Voluntary Registration
scenarios.description: When to register even if turnover is below threshold
questions: My annual turnover is only 15 lakhs but my clients require GST invoices. Should I register voluntarily?
What are the benefits and obligations of voluntary GST registration?
Can I cancel voluntary registration if I don't want it anymore?

scenarios.title: Multiple Business Verticals
questions: I run both a restaurant and a clothing store. Do I need separate GST registrations?
Can I have multiple GSTINs in the same state for different business locations?
How does ITC work when I have multiple registrations?
